comments.raw_text:
Similar to bug 654450, the Channels blog should probably be syndicated to Planet Firefox, as well, for those of us who choose not to follow Planet Mozilla.

Borrowing Ehsan's proposal:
>
Blog URL: http://blog.mozilla.com/channels/
Feed URL: http://blog.mozilla.com/channels/feed/atom/
Description: The Channels blog aggregates all of the information we have floating around about the rapid release process.
<

On a side note, is there a reason that Planet Firefox Mobile has a Bugzilla component, but Planet Firefox doesn't? Should I file a bug for that?
comments.creator: gphemsley@gphemsley.org
